name: Belphegor
description:
One of the Seven Princes of Hell, Belphegor as the demon of sloth. 
He is very good at seducing and deceiving, he has many forms and changes his appearance according to situations that can benefit him in manipulating his victims to obey his orders.
though others say he seduces people by giving them ingenious ideas for inventions that will make them rich, which of course Belphegor can snatch it all away at any moment.
